The naga story part 1: the beginng
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Incomplete Epics (left unfinished for over a year): The naga story part 1: the beginng
By Terance on Friday, November 29, 2002 - 08:23 pm:

"Well" said me as i went into the lab and told what was on my tablet.The shrine glowedthen a purple beast came out at first i thought "darn just a naga" until i found out his abillitys. i rasied him in power but stiped intellagince away. until one day he couldnt beat the c class fight.I said "im sorry naga but you have to go be frozen. That was a very sad day in my life, but time has passed on.
I went back to the shrine and told them another tablet. I was shocked by what i saw. A red naga with white arms. He was called Miasman. I decided to keep his name that way. When i took him back to the ranch i accidently yelled at him twice making him evil. one of his attacks where erased and was now called EVIL BOMB. BUt to my surprise...........


Hey guys do you like this if not you can delete this but if you like it ill contenue with part 2 Miasman goes good!
